CustomField.description: This field will store the notification type of the notice that needs to be sent to the spouse of the borrower in the loan application.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will store the notification type of the notice that needs to be sent to the spouse of the borrower in the loan application.
CustomField.label: Spousal Notice

value.fullName: A copy of the document evidencing extension of credit
value.label: A copy of the document evidencing extension of credit

value.fullName: A copy of the credit disclosure given to Applicant
value.label: A copy of the credit disclosure given to Applicant

value.fullName: No enclosure is included with Notice
value.label: No enclosure is included with Notice
